inapplicable.help: IDs used in ARIA and labels must be unique

inapplicable.help: <object> elements must have alternate text

nodes.html: Most hereditary gastrointestinal tumours occur as part of a distinct inherited syndrome. Each of these is due to alteration in a specific gene or one of a group of genes, and has a characteristic set of clinical features.
